actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.
Reported to House from the Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce with amendment, H. Rept. 94-1244.
Measure called up under motion to suspend rules and pass in House.
Measure failed of passage in House under suspension of rules, roll call #764 (118-268).

official_title: A bill to authorize appropriations of the Department of Commerce to be available until expended or for periods in excess of 1 year.

summary.text: (Reported to House from the Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce with amendment, H. Rept. 94-1244) States that appropriations of the Department of Commerce may be available without fiscal year limitations or for periods in excess of one fiscal year, whenever so specified in an appropriation Act. Applies this Act to authorizations enacted after the date of enactment of this Act, unless such authorization specifically provides that funds appropriated pursuant thereto shall revert to the U.S. Treasury if not obligated or expended.

titles.title: A bill to authorize appropriations of the Department of Commerce to be available until expended or for periods in excess of 1 year.
